channel.title: Writing on Unbounded School
channel.description: Recent content in Writing on Unbounded School

item.description: What I would do with 1,000,000 dollars is buy toys for my sister, nice dresses and earrings for my mom, and Reeses and new shoes for my dad. Then, I would buy lot of beautiful fabric and art materials. Last, I would go all around the world in amazing private plane. Thatâ€™s just some things I would do with 1,000,000 dollars!
